column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This is one of the greatest collections of art in the world (and more impressive than many European galleries I have visited).  The visitor's guide is a must if you only have a short time
column2: as it has a list of the "must see" works in the museum.  It saves time and makes your trip more enjoyable.  The staff is helpful
column3: and it shows that they have pride in this amazing place.  The price is steep
column4: so be sure to look for any discounts or free nights (I'm not sure they offer them anymore
column5: but there were free nights at one point).  This is worth the wait in line
column6: or worth purchasing a fast pass.  I discover a new favorite work every time I am here
column7: and the special exhibits are always top-notch.
